original_title: The Joke Must Go On: The Overlord Story
overview: Recounting the secret thirty-year history of the band Overlord in just under 20 minutes. Culled from VHS tapes, super 8 and 16mm film, cassettes and CDs, this multimedia smorgasbord reveals the story behind the story you already didnâ€™t know.
title: The Joke Must Go On: The Overlord Story
